CustomField.description: Enter the name of the user in the MTech Salesforce Org that has the same access that is required for the new employee. The new employee will be set up with the same profile and permissions as this user.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of the user in the MTech Salesforce Org that has the same access that is required for the new employee. The new employee will be set up with the same profile and permissions as this user.
CustomField.label: Copy Existing MTech SF User/Profile
